panels.description: Amount of CPU time stolen by the hypervisor for other VMs
panels.title: Top Node CPU Steal

targets.expr: bottomk(1, 100 - ( sum(netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{family!~"/dev|/dev/.*|/boot|/var/lib/osd/.*|/opt/pwx/.*|/run|/run/.*",dimension="used",instance=~"$node"}) by (instance, family) / (sum(netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{family!~"/dev|/dev/.*|/boot|/var/lib/osd/.*|/opt/pwx/.*|/run|/run/.*",dimension="used",instance=~"$node"}) by (instance, family) + sum(netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{family!~"/dev|/dev/.*|/boot|/var/lib/osd/.*|/opt/pwx/.*|/run|/run/.*",dimension="avail",instance=~"$node"}) by (instance, family)) ) * 100)

topk(1, sum(netdata_apps_files_open_files_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_users_files_open_files_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_apps_sockets_open_sockets_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_users_sockets_open_sockets_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_groups_sockets_open_sockets_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_apps_pipes_open_pipes_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_users_pipes_open_pipes_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance) + sum(netdata_groups_pipes_open_pipes_average{instance=~"$node"}) by (instance))
